title: In Praise of the Ironsmith - causation

content.question: The technological innovations described in the excerpt most directly contributed to

choices.label: the wealth and power of the Mali Empire
the conversion of Central Africa to Christianity
population growth in West and Central Africa
increased travel by African elites to Mediterranean port cities

content.answer: population growth in West and Central Africa

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
